context: The word 'ründasid' is the past tense plural form of the Estonian verb 'ründa', which means 'to attack'. It indicates that multiple subjects performed the action of attacking in the past. The root word 'ründa' can be conjugated for different tenses, persons and numbers: ründan (I attack), rändad (you attack), ründab (he/she/it attacks), ründame (we attack), ründate (you plural attack).
